original_title: National Christmas Tree Lighting: Celebrating 100 Years
overview: Lighting up the holidays with this beloved American tradition in its 100th year, presented by the National Park Service and National Park Foundation. Celebrating the official tree lighting on the Ellipse in President's Park in Washington, D.C., and experiencing an all-star lineup of musical performances with the whole family from the comfort of home.
title: National Christmas Tree Lighting: Celebrating 100 Years
